name: part_006
file: tmp_[#AkiRoseBirthday2021] 3D birthday celebration in my first idol costume! [HoloLive⧸AkiRose] [1Ts7X3vtYgQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: AkiRose introduces the live performance section of her birthday celebration.
AkiRose performs the song 'Yumemiru Sora e'.
AkiRose talks to the audience after the song and introduces the next track.

subtitles.original: 今日は遅くなっちゃったけど、生誕祭お祝いしてくれてありがとう！
subtitles.english: It's a bit late, but thank you for celebrating my birthday!

subtitles.original: ライブパート盛り上げていくぞー！
subtitles.english: Let's get hyped for the live performance part!

subtitles.original: 重ねた手は　ぎゅっと離さずに
subtitles.english: Holding our hands tight, never letting go

subtitles.original: 行くよ！夢見る空へ
subtitles.english: Here we go! To the dreaming sky

subtitles.original:
夢見る空へ
作詞・作曲・編曲：永塚健登 / Kento Nagatsuka
subtitles.english:
To the Dreaming Sky
Lyrics/Composition/Arrangement: Kento Nagatsuka

subtitles.original: まばたきも見上げたら　とても小さな空
subtitles.english: If I look up without blinking, the sky looks so small

subtitles.original: ここで出会えたのは　数え切れない奇跡
subtitles.english: Meeting here is a miracle beyond count

subtitles.original: 繰り返した一歩が　煌めきをつないで
subtitles.english: The steps we've taken connect the sparkles

subtitles.original: 虹のような笑顔　導いた
subtitles.english: And led to a rainbow-like smile

subtitles.original: Step by Step　みんなの声が力になる
subtitles.english: Step by Step, everyone's voices become my strength

subtitles.original: Stage by Stage　ここでそれぞれ目指すもの
subtitles.english: Stage by Stage, what we each aim for here

subtitles.original: それぞれ描くもの　それぞれ願った夢
subtitles.english: What we each envision, the dreams we each wished for

subtitles.original: 重ねた手は　ぎゅっと離さずに
subtitles.english: Holding our hands tight, never letting go

subtitles.original: 独りじゃない　声が響き出すときめき
subtitles.english: I'm not alone, the excitement of voices beginning to echo

subtitles.original: 振り向くことなくまっすぐに
subtitles.english: Straight ahead, without looking back

subtitles.original: 行くよ！夢見る空へ
subtitles.english: Here we go! To the dreaming sky

subtitles.original: 笑い合ったことや　突きそうにないまばたき
subtitles.english: The times we laughed together, the moments that seem like they'll never end

subtitles.original: 思い出いっぱいなのに　あっという間の日々
subtitles.english: Even with so many memories, the days go by in a flash

subtitles.original: 上書きじゃなくって　名前付けて保存
subtitles.english: Not overwriting, but saving with a name

subtitles.original: どれも全部大事で　生き切れる
subtitles.english: Every bit is precious, and I can live through it all

subtitles.original: One for All　みんなのためが力になる
subtitles.english: One for All, doing it for everyone becomes my strength

subtitles.original: All for One　今日も賑やかすぎるから
subtitles.english: All for One, because today is just so lively

subtitles.original: 笑顔が止まらない　思いは膨らんでいく
subtitles.english: My smile won't stop, and my feelings keep growing

subtitles.original: 重ねたいま　ぎゅっと噛み締めた
subtitles.english: I savored this moment we shared

subtitles.original: 独りじゃない　歌声は広がる
subtitles.english: I'm not alone, the singing voices spread out

subtitles.original: 風を感じたら　まっすぐに
subtitles.english: When I feel the breeze, I'll go straight ahead

subtitles.original: 行くよ！夢見る空へ
subtitles.english: Here we go! To the dreaming sky

subtitles.original: 憧れ 手を伸ばし　掴み取った　その光が
subtitles.english: The light I reached out for and grasped

subtitles.original: いつの日か　誰かの　憧れに変わる　繋げよう
subtitles.english: Will one day become someone's aspiration, let's pass it on

subtitles.original: 重ねた手は　ぎゅっと離さずに
subtitles.english: Holding our hands tight, never letting go

subtitles.original: 独りじゃない　声が響き出すときめき
subtitles.english: I'm not alone, the excitement of voices beginning to echo

subtitles.original: 出会ったすべてにありがとう
subtitles.english: Thank you for everything I've encountered

subtitles.original: 奇跡　起こし続けて　ずっと　そばにいるよ
subtitles.english: I'll keep making miracles and always stay by your side

subtitles.original: 行くよ！夢見る空へ
subtitles.english: Here we go! To the dreaming sky

subtitles.original: Thank you!
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: ふぅー！ということで、一曲目
subtitles.english: Phew! So, that was the first song,

subtitles.original: 「夢見る空へ」でした！
subtitles.english: 'To the Dreaming Sky'!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: ふぅー！いやー、このライブ、
subtitles.english: Phew! Man, for this live show,

subtitles.original: アイドルとして踊るのを
subtitles.english: dancing as an idol was something

subtitles.original: すごいちょっと楽しみにしてたんだ。
subtitles.english: I was really looking forward to.

subtitles.original: ということで、じゃあ、続いて
subtitles.english: So then, moving right along,

subtitles.original: 次の曲も行っちゃいたいと思います。
subtitles.english: I'd like to perform the next song.

subtitles.original: みんなからもね、歌ってほしいなって
subtitles.english: This is a song that many of you

subtitles.original: リクエストがすごい多かった曲になるので、
subtitles.english: specifically requested for me to sing,

subtitles.original: アキロゼもずっとやりたかったので
subtitles.english: and since I've wanted to do it for a long time,

subtitles.original: 今日は楽しくやっちゃいたいと思います。
subtitles.english: I'm going to have fun with it today.

subtitles.original: それでは聞いてください。
subtitles.english: Now, please listen to...

subtitles.original: 「月と太陽のめぐり」
subtitles.english: 'The Moon and Sun's Cycle'
